author: Lesley Waters
method: Lay the ciabatta bread slices on a flat surface, spread one side with butter and turn over, butter-side down.  Top with prosciutto, basil and Dolcelatte, then place the other slice of bread on top, butter-side up.  Heat a non-stick frying pan, add the sandwich and pan fry for three minutes on each side. Transfer to a plate and cut into triangles. For the salad, mix the Little Gem lettuce, olive oil and balsamic vinegar in a small bowl. To serve, pile the Little Gem lettuce mixture onto a serving plate, top with the croque monsieur and serve immediately.
ingredients: 2 slices ciabatta, crusts removed,  25g/1oz butter, softened,  2 slices prosciutto,  5 fresh basil leaves,  85g/3oz Dolcelatte, crumbled,  1 Little Gem lettuce, chopped,  dash olive oil,  dash balsamic vinegar
